{ "id": 7153296638214, "title": "Stone Island - DSM Men's David-TC Heavy Coat - (Black)", "handle": "stone-island-mens-giaccone-black-aw23-791571649", "body_html": "

Exclusively produced for Dover Street Market London.

\n

Iconic Stone Island pieces are reimagined in all black with a serigraphic Dover Street Market print under the Stone Island badge.

\n

Collar with snap to wear it standing.
Epaulettes.
Two slanting hand pockets with fixed flap.
Stone Island badge on the left sleeve.
Adjustable buttoned straps at cuffs.
Fastened through two ways zip hidden under hidden buttons placket.
